languages.text: "Закончить... начатое... да... остановить..." {n}Голос Хейнрикса становится слабее. Лед ползет по его телу, охватывая его целиком, сковывая его грудь, плечи, руки... с хриплым вздохом дознаватель замирает навсегда — с остекленевшим взглядом в пустоту и легкой, почти счастливой улыбкой на лице.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Закончить... начатое... да... остановить..." {n}Голос Хейнрикса становится слабее. Лед ползет по его телу, охватывая его целиком, сковывая его грудь, плечи, руки... с хриплым вздохом дознаватель замирает навсегда — с остекленевшим взглядом в пустоту и легкой, почти счастливой улыбкой на лице.{/n}

languages.text: "Finish... what... I started... Stop..." {n}Heinrix's voice grows weaker. The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Закончить... начатое... да... остановить..." {n}Голос Хейнрикса становится слабее. Лед ползет по его телу, охватывая его целиком, сковывая его грудь, плечи, руки... с хриплым вздохом дознаватель замирает навсегда — с остекленевшим взглядом в пустоту и легкой, почти счастливой улыбкой на лице.{/n}

The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}

languages.text: “由我……而起……结束……不再……”{n}海因里希的声音越来越微弱。寒冰蔓延到了他的身体上，彻底覆住了他，裹住了他的胸膛、肩膀与手臂……伴随着一声嘶哑的叹息，这位审讯官永远地停滞了下来。他呆滞的双眼凝视着虚无，脸上挂着一丝微弱的笑意，几近幸福。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Finish... what... I started... Stop..." {n}Heinrix's voice grows weaker. The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “由我……而起……结束……不再……”{n}海因里希的声音越来越微弱。寒冰蔓延到了他的身体上，彻底覆住了他，裹住了他的胸膛、肩膀与手臂……伴随着一声嘶哑的叹息，这位审讯官永远地停滞了下来。他呆滞的双眼凝视着虚无，脸上挂着一丝微弱的笑意，几近幸福。{/n}

languages.text: «Terminar... lo que... he empezado... Detener...». {n}La voz de Heinrix se debilita poco a poco. El hielo recorre su cuerpo, tapándolo por completo, sepultando su pecho, sus hombros, sus brazos... con un suspiro rasgado, el interrogador se detiene eternamente, mirando el vacío con ojos vidriosos y una pequeña sonrisa, casi feliz, en la boca.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Finish... what... I started... Stop..." {n}Heinrix's voice grows weaker. The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Terminar... lo que... he empezado... Detener...». {n}La voz de Heinrix se debilita poco a poco. El hielo recorre su cuerpo, tapándolo por completo, sepultando su pecho, sus hombros, sus brazos... con un suspiro rasgado, el interrogador se detiene eternamente, mirando el vacío con ojos vidriosos y una pequeña sonrisa, casi feliz, en la boca.{/n}

languages.text: 「終わらせるんだ…俺が…始めたことを…止めるんだ…」{n}ハインリックスの声が弱っていく。氷は彼の体を這い上がり、胸、肩、腕をすっぽりと包み込む…荒いため息とともに、インテロゲイターは永遠に静止し、ガラスのような目で何もない空間を見つめていた。その顔には小さく、かすかに幸せそうな笑みを浮かべていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Finish... what... I started... Stop..." {n}Heinrix's voice grows weaker. The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「終わらせるんだ…俺が…始めたことを…止めるんだ…」{n}ハインリックスの声が弱っていく。氷は彼の体を這い上がり、胸、肩、腕をすっぽりと包み込む…荒いため息とともに、インテロゲイターは永遠に静止し、ガラスのような目で何もない空間を見つめていた。その顔には小さく、かすかに幸せそうな笑みを浮かべていた。{/n}

languages.text: « Finir... ce que j'ai... commencé... Souffrance... » {n}La voix d'Heinrix faiblit. La glace recouvre lentement la totalité de son corps ; d'abord son torse, puis ses épaules et ses bras... Dans un dernier soupir, l'interrogateur s'éteint, ses yeux vitreux perdus dans le vide et un sourire presque joyeux aux lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Finish... what... I started... Stop..." {n}Heinrix's voice grows weaker. The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Finir... ce que j'ai... commencé... Souffrance... » {n}La voix d'Heinrix faiblit. La glace recouvre lentement la totalité de son corps ; d'abord son torse, puis ses épaules et ses bras... Dans un dernier soupir, l'interrogateur s'éteint, ses yeux vitreux perdus dans le vide et un sourire presque joyeux aux lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: "Bringt zu Ende ... was ... Ich begonnen habe ... Hört auf ..." {n}Heinrix' Stimme wird schwächer. Das Eis kriecht seinen Körper hinauf, umschlingt ihn komplett, seine Brust, seine Schultern und seine Arme ... und nach einem röchelnden Seufzer bleibt der Interrogator für immer still, seine glasigen Augen starren ins Leere. Sein Gesicht zeigt dabei ein kleines, fast glückliches Lächeln.{/n}

languages.text: "Başladığım... İşi... Bitir... Son ver..." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, gittikçe gücünü kaybediyor. Buz, bedenine sinsice yayılarak onu tamamen kaplıyor. Göğsünü, omuzlarını ve kollarını kapatıyor. Sorgucu, kulak tırmalayan bir iç çekişle nihayete eriyor. Yüzünde ufak, mutlu bir gülümseme belirirken donuk gözleri, boşluğa bakakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Finish... what... I started... Stop..." {n}Heinrix's voice grows weaker. The ice creeps up his body, covering him entirely, encasing his chest, shoulders, and arms... with a rasping sigh, the Interrogator goes still forever, his glassy eyes staring into empty space and a small, almost happy smile on his face.{/n}
